hypothesis: DE has different mutation/crossover mechanism than CMA-ES. May find optima CMA-ES misses or converge faster.

tuning_runs.notes: Way too slow without temporal fidelity

tuning_runs.config: With temporal fidelity: maxiter 10/15, popsize 5, refine 8
tuning_runs.notes: Still too slow and poor accuracy
Better! Faster but slightly worse accuracy
Close but sample 36 has RMSE 0.966 outlier
Best configuration: -0.0037 score, -3.8 min vs baseline

key_finding: DE cannot match CMA-ES accuracy for this problem. DE's mutation/crossover mechanism is less efficient than CMA-ES's covariance adaptation for finding optimal heat source positions. DE is faster due to simpler computation but sacrifices accuracy.
